properties.name: http.nonProxyHosts
properties.description: Hosts delimited by |, what will ignored for http and https Proxies

properties.name: proxy-format.app-http-no-proxy.format
properties.description: Setup the format of the no proxy application attribute. The values OS, JAVA and OTHER are possible. If OTHER is set the property proxy-format.app-http-no-proxy.formatter must be set.

properties.name: proxy-format.app-http-no-proxy.formatter
properties.description: Class of a custom formatter, that should be used if proxy-format.app-http-no-proxy.format is set to OTHER.
